CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Transmission stage positioned above or below the Post-Distribution stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Transmission stage is positioned {above} the Post-Distribution stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Distribution?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Distribution is {37404}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Transmission?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Transmission is {66534}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Billed Consumption?
VE.A: The value of stage Billed Consumption is {14393}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Post-Generation, with a value of {94597}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Paid Consumption, with a value of {12286}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Delivered to End Users to stage Billed Consumption?
SC.A: Decreased by {8271} Megawatt Hours from stage Delivered to End Users to stage Billed Consumption.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission?
SC.A: Decreased by {28063} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 30034? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Generation} stage has {94597}, the {Post-Transmission} stage has {66534}, the {Post-Distribution} stage has {37404}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 18528? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Billed Consumption} stage has {14393}, the {Paid Consumption} stage has {12286}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 18528 and 51969? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Post-Distribution} stage has {37404}, the {Delivered to End Users} stage has {22664}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, or from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Transmission} to {Post-Distribution} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission, or from stage Billed Consumption to Paid Consumption?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Transmission} to stage {Post-Distribution} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Transmission} and {Post-Distribution} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Billed Consumption} and {Paid Consumption} stages.
